course.title: MAT 1371 Descriptive Statistics (3 units)
course.desc: Topics from descriptive statistics: histograms and boxplot; average and observed standard deviation; elementary probability; normal distribution; statistical estimation and hypothesis testing; correlation and regression. Examples analyzed with statistical software.Course Component: Discussion Group, LectureThe courses MAT1371, MAT2371, MAT2377, MAT2379 cannot be combined for units. This course cannot count for unit in any program in the Faculty of Science or Engineering.
